610111.name: Debuff
610111.desc: All enemies have a <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> lower chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs.
610111.battleDesc: All enemies have a <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> lower chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs.

610114.name: Debuff

610114.battleDesc: All enemies are further delayed by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> upon Weakness Break.

610115.name: Debuff
610115.desc: All enemies take <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> increased DMG while in the Weakness Break status.
610115.battleDesc: All enemies take <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> increased DMG while in the Weakness Break status.

620001.name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field (Infinite)
620001.desc: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
620001.shortDesc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG on the attacking enemy based on the total Shield effect on the character before they were hit.
620001.battleDesc: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
620001.desc2: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
620001.shortDesc2: After a character is hit by an attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG on the attacking enemy based on the total Shield effect on the character before they were hit.
620001.battleDesc2: After a character is attacked, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG to the attacker, equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

620002.name: Ultimate Experience: Sentimentality (Infinite)
620002.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, additionally receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG. All other enemies will also receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG.
620002.shortDesc: Ice DMG dealt to an enemy can be Blasted to all enemies.
620002.battleDesc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, additionally receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG. All other enemies will also receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG.

620002.shortDesc2: Ice DMG dealt to an enemy can be Blasted to all enemies.
620002.battleDesc2: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, additionally receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG. All other enemies will also receive DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DMG.

620003.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared? (Infinite)
620003.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, additionally causes DoT for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> times, and makes their current DoT immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DoT.
620003.shortDesc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> extra time(s).
620003.battleDesc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, additionally causes DoT for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> times, and makes their current DoT immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DoT.
620003.desc2: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, additionally causes DoT for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> times, and makes their current DoT immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the original DoT.

620004.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity (Infinite)
620004.desc: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the amount of healing received. Moreover, increases the DMG of <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.
620004.shortDesc: When a character's HP is restored, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by <u>Dewdrop</u> is increased.
620004.battleDesc: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the amount of healing received. Moreover, increases the DMG of <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.

620004.battleDesc2: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the amount of healing received. Moreover, increases the DMG of <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.

620005.name: Empyrean Imperium (Infinite)
620005.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and increases the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u> to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color>.
620005.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and raises the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

620006.name: Cataclysmic Blazar (Infinite)
620006.desc: For every 1% of HP that characters lose, increases their DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. After unleashing an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
620006.shortDesc: The lower the character's current HP, the higher the DMG they deal. They will also deal Additional DMG based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP

620007.name: Auto-Harmonica: Whitest Night (Infinite)
620007.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of their ATK for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> – <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> time(s). 620008.name: Fungal Pustule (Infinite)
620008.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 <u>Spore</u> to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> random enemy target(s). The max number of <u>Spores</u> that can be possessed increases to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color>.

650011.name: Resonance Extrapolation: "The Hunt"
650011.desc: When Resonance Extrapolation: "The Hunt" takes action, it deals Wind DMG to all allies based on the boss' Type . All units' actions Advance Forward the Resonance's action.

650012.name: Formation Extrapolation: Bow and Arrow
650012.desc: When Resonance Extrapolation deals DMG to allies with HP below <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of their Max HP, its CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> and CRIT DMG increases to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.
650012.battleDesc: When Resonance Extrapolation deals DMG to allies with HP below <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of their Max HP, its CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> and CRIT DMG increases to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.

650022.name: Formation Extrapolation: Extreme Helium Flash

650023.name: Formation Extrapolation: Zero Age Main Sequence
650023.desc: After a target is defeated, Resonance Extrapolation's action will be Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>.

650032.name: Formation Extrapolation: The Doubtful Fourfold Root

650041.name: Resonance Extrapolation: "Abundance"

3112003.desc: <color=#f29e38ff>Piercing Cold</color>. There is a small chance to trigger at the start of the turn, dealing DMG to the enemy with the highest HP.

3112205.name: Cycle of Flame

3112303.name: Hurried Rains Chase the Midnight Maple
3112303.desc: <color=#f29e38ff>Learned Entangling Duskvines</color>. There is a chance to trigger at the end of a turn, inflicting Autumn Lariat to a single enemy. The enemy receives minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on the enemy to immediately deal DMG 1 time.
3112303.battleDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Learned Entangling Duskvines</color>. There is a chance to trigger at the end of a turn, inflicting Autumn Lariat to a single enemy. The enemy receives minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on the enemy to immediately deal DMG 1 time.

3112304.name: Wilted Grass
3112304.desc: Each stack of Autumn Lariat's DMG <color=#f29e38ff>multiplier</color> is additionally increased.
3112304.battleDesc: Each stack of Autumn Lariat's DMG <color=#f29e38ff>multiplier</color> is additionally increased.

3112305.name: Fractured Unity
3112305.desc: <color=#f29e38ff>Entangling Duskvines improves</color> to: Inflicts Autumn Lariat to a single enemy attacked in this turn and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color>, up to <color=#f29e38ff><color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> stacks</color>. The enemy receives minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on the enemy and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color> to immediately deal DMG 1 time.
3112305.battleDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Entangling Duskvines improves</color> to: Inflicts Autumn Lariat to a single enemy attacked in this turn and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color>, up to <color=#f29e38ff><color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> stacks</color>. The enemy receives minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on the enemy and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color> to immediately deal DMG 1 time.

3112306.name: Bleak Note
3112306.desc: Each stack of Autumn Lariat's DMG <color=#f29e38ff>multiplier</color> is additionally increased.
3112306.battleDesc: Each stack of Autumn Lariat's DMG <color=#f29e38ff>multiplier</color> is additionally increased.

3112307.name: Fallen Bright
3112307.desc: <color=#f29e38ff>Entangling Duskvines improves</color> to: Inflicts Autumn Lariat to all enemies attacked in this turn and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color>, up to <color=#f29e38ff><color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> stacks</color>. The enemies receive minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on <color=#f29e38ff>all enemies </color> to immediately deal DMG 1 time.
3112307.battleDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Entangling Duskvines improves</color> to: Inflicts Autumn Lariat to all enemies attacked in this turn and <color=#f29e38ff>its adjacent units</color>, up to <color=#f29e38ff><color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> stacks</color>. The enemies receive minor DoT at the start of each turn. Causes Autumn Lariat on <color=#f29e38ff>all enemies </color> to immediately deal DMG 1 time.

3112401.name: Spring's Lingering Freeze
3112401.desc: After triggering Cutting Cold / Molten Lapis, immediately <color=#f29e38ff>trigger additionally</color> Molten Lapis / Cutting Cold 1 time. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.
3112401.battleDesc: After triggering Cutting Cold / Molten Lapis, immediately <color=#f29e38ff>trigger additionally</color> Molten Lapis / Cutting Cold 1 time. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

3112402.name: Unabating Rainstorm
3112402.desc: After triggering Apricot Petalfall / Entangling Duskvines, immediately <color=#f29e38ff>trigger additionally</color> Entangling Duskvines / Apricot Petalfall 1 time. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.
3112402.battleDesc: After triggering Apricot Petalfall / Entangling Duskvines, immediately <color=#f29e38ff>trigger additionally</color> Entangling Duskvines / Apricot Petalfall 1 time. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.
